messages.otherTeamExit: The other team quit the game. You’ve won!!!
messages.winText: Congrats! You are the winner. You’ve won!
messages.loseText: Sorry, you’ve lost. But you’ve earned {0} bugs for the good job!
messages.rules: Collect more garbage than the competitor’s team.
messages.bonusRules: Use a magnet collector to catch bonuses. They will allow you to neutralize any garbage with any gun within 3 seconds.
